Text: I wish I had the bandwidth for such a project, I hate to reduce the picture quality of these classics, but it's the only way I can make them available. I tried uploading a couple of "Fulldvds" but not enough downloaders to keep something that big alive for very long, most downloaders like the smaller files. I will do everything I can to keep the re-encoded files looking like the DVD (Fluid motion, dark contrast levels, etc.) but right now I can't do much more than expand the bandwith well past the popular "701 MB" standard. I'll continuing doing what I can to make picture quality the first priority, any re-encoding hints or tips would be considered helpful.
By the way here is the imdb link: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0041373/
Thank you for all the classic movies they are my favs!!
